item.title: Evofarm
item.description:
Evolufarm is a farming game started on Friday 1st December 2017.

Your grandfather died few days ago, he left you a farm and debts as an inheritance.

You have work and sold recolts to repay debts.

Get plants, get tools, get machines.

Evolve your plants, upgrade your tools, upgrade your machines.
